content.rendered:
The four-point bending test is the most important test for assessing quality

We offer a range of Flexural Testing Equipment including M350-5CT, the Bench-Mounted Twin Column Computer Controlled Universal Strength Testing Machine and M350-5AT, an Advanced Machine with Integral PC System running, Touch Screen Display and Active Tester Control Panel showing Real-time Test Curves, Calculated Results and Statistics

  • The Machines are supplied with LC 500 High Accuracy Grade 0.5 Load Cells with range 5000 N Tension & Compression
  • The Machines come with a 4 Point GRC Bend of Adjustable Span
  • The Machines use a Fully Integrated and Customizable WinTest Analysis Universal Testing Software
  • The machines are used to determine the Modulus of Rupture (MOR) and Limit of Proportionality (LOP) of GRC Specimen

excerpt.rendered:
Bench mounted twin column computer controlled universal strength testing machine.

  • Maximum capacity 5kN
  • High accuracy grade 0.5 load cell.
  • Range 5000N tension and compression
  • A full machine control Windows based Universal test program
  • Adjustable span 4-point bend fixture.
  • Complies with GRCA, European, USA and other International Standards.
